div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 471 Gephyra, near Thessalonica, Mace- donia, 1967 Burial: 200-150 B.C. (Oeconomides) Contents: 38 AR Phocis: 1 triob. Boeotia: 2 triob. Chalcis: 2 dr. Histiaea: 31 tetrob. Sicyon: 1 triob. Arcadia: 1 triob. Disposition: Thessalonica The alleged findspot is peculiar in view of the composition of the hd.
